sections.title: How we help you
sections.summary: ReportStream is CDCâ€™s free, interoperable platform for streamlining public health reporting. We navigate unique and changing requirements and work to make sure your data is where it needs to be.

features.title: 1. Create a personalized plan to meet your unique data needs.
features.summary: Our expert team works with your preferences to accept data in HL7, FHIR and CSV, and deliver data through multiple connection types.

features.title: 2. Start sending or receiving data.
features.summary: Through our secure, cloud-based platform, data is validated, routed and transformed to the correct jurisdictions in the correct formatting.

features.title: 3. Stay updated on the status of your data.
features.summary: Our expert support team is on call and ready to solve any problems that arise.

liveMapContact.title: Who ReportStream works with
liveMapContact.summary: ReportStream partners with public health entities, labs, test manufacturers, data aggregators, and others across the U.S.
liveMapContact.description: We're growing quickly. Take a look at the complete list of ReportStream partners.

features.imgAlt: Map of the U.S. showing states and territories where ReportStream is currently live
